instruction: Enable each cell in the column"Pass/Fail/Held" is a drop down list

minimal: `MOUSE_DOWN` the first cell of the cells in the "Pass/Fail/Held" column.
`DRAG_TO` the last cell of the cells in the "Pass/Fail/Held" column.
`CLICK` List from the Allow dropdown in the Data Validation window,
batched: `MOUSE_DOWN` the first cell of the cells in the "Pass/Fail/Held" column.
`DRAG_TO` the last cell of the cells in the "Pass/Fail/Held" column.
`CLICK` List from the Allow dropdown in the Data Validation window,
